title:
Why is there such a big difference between gas station prices? GoGas on 17th st is 3.56 and the Kangaroo on Oleander is 3.61, yet, the stations down at Monkey Junction are averaging 3.78 to 3.83??

I am very confused



P
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3214
